snippet.title: How to Make a Skull Mask? - Ask.com
snippet.description: An easy way to make a skull mask is to buy a black stocking mask or a black pair of tights. Paint a skull on the fabric using white fabric paint and pull it over.

snippet.title: How to Make the Skull Mask from Zelda: Ocarina of Time
snippet.description: First draw out your cartoony skull shape on paper. It's not really necessary to draw the whole thing out at this point. Just make sure you are happy with one half .
